+" X="+rs.getInt(2)+" Y="+rs.getInt(3)+" HeightLevel="+rs.getInt(4))";

                                                                ^

item.title: Help with error please
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

[code]SqlHandler.java:194: ‘)’ expected
println(“Place=”+rs.getString(1)
" X="+rs.getInt(2)+" Y="+rs.getInt(3)+“HeightLevel=”+rs.getInt(4);

^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

it had 3 errors i fixed 2 but this one i cant fix.

the code is:

gotoCount = rs.getRow(); gotoPlaces[gotoCount] = rs.getString(1); gotoPlacesX[gotoCount] = rs.getInt(2); gotoPlacesY[gotoCount] = rs.getInt(3); gotoPlacesHeightLevel[gotoCount] = rs.getInt(4); println("Place="+rs.getString(1)" X="+rs.getInt(2)+" Y="+rs.getInt(3)+"HeightLevel="+rs.getInt(4); } stmt.close(); return gotoCount; } catch (Exception e) { } return gotoCount; }

ALSO i tryed uploading all my files into a sql database and this happened.

( to long to post all so ill post the bottom section)

its just a load of text from my files with errors :S how else can i upload server
